long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
G-Switch 3 is an exciting online game that is available as a Chrome extension. You can also play it for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/. In G-Switch 3, you control a character who is constantly running. The unique twist in this game is that you can switch the gravity, causing your character to run on the ceiling or the floor. Your objective is to navigate through a series of challenging levels filled with obstacles and traps. Timing and reflexes are crucial as you must switch the gravity at the right moment to avoid falling into pits or colliding with obstacles. The game offers various modes, including a single-player campaign and a multiplayer mode where you can compete against other players. With its fast-paced gameplay and addictive mechanics, G-Switch 3 provides an exhilarating gaming experience that will test your skills and keep you entertained. Are you ready to defy gravity and conquer the challenging levels of G-Switch 3? Play now and see how far you can go!

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website https://classroom-6x.org, https://poki.ee
